alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264; Western Mogollon Rim; White Mountains; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 15 at 2:17AM MST until February 15 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts 40 to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Much of northern and central Arizona, especially along and downwind of the Mogollon Rim. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects and cause minor tree damage. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Localized power outages are also possible.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
